content: here is my pattern of the modifications i did to the cloudburst shawl 1 by tuesdayfortnite 2 i would like to say thank you to her for all of her help and allowing me to post this as my first pattern to get a feel for the designer side of ravelry this pattern is in us terms mine measured out to be 58 inches wingtip to wingtip and 21 inches for body length this is my first written pattern and chart chart was redrawn by my talented friend lisa my chart was shameful lol she rocks 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/cloudburst-shawl 2 http //www ravelry com/designers/tuesday-fortnite
